original_text: When I go out into the fields, I see the bodies of people who have died in war. When I look in the city, I see people who are dying from famine. The prophets and the priests are busy with their work. But they do not understand what is happening.” ’ A prayer that the Lord would save his people 14: When I go out into the fields, I see the bodies of people who have died in war. korean_text: 내가 들에 나간즉 칼에 죽은 자요 내가 성읍에 들어간즉 기근으로 병든 자며 선지자나 제사장이나 알지 못하는 땅으로 두루 다니도다

sentences.original_text: When I go out into the fields
I see the bodies of people
When I look in the city
I see people who are dying
The prophets and the priests are busy
